p: The increasing resistance to bnAbs observed on T/F viruses sampled from infected individuals over the course of the epidemic raises the issue of the panels used to evaluate bnAbs and vaccine-induced anti-HIV-1 humoral response [ 63, 94] and the necessity of updating them in the future. In other words, it is important to keep monitoring the sensitivity of HIV-1 to bnAbs over the course of the epidemic to better characterize its evolution for different clades and how it could impact immunization strategies.
